      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double[] position,
               boolean[] update)
        Parameters:
        position - array of doubles containing position[0] = x value position[1] = y value position[2] = theta value
        update - array of booleans specifying which values of the odometer are to be updated update[0] = update X update[1] = update Y update[2] = update theta
